Udo Kier (born Udo Kierspe; 14 October 1944) is a German actor. He has appeared in over 200 movies. He was born in Cologne, Germany.
Kier is known for his roles in Ron Camp in (1994), Curly in "Barb Wire", as a NASA flight psychologist in "Armageddon", and as Ralfi in the movie "Johnny Mnemonic".
Kier moved to Palm Springs, California in 1991.
